definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: tremble, be terrified (As. ḫarâdu, id., acc. to Dl:HA 20, Pr 46; Ar. xarida be bashful, shamefaced; NH [[חֲרָדָה]] a trembling)—
tremble, quake, of a mountain Ex 19:18—so HCT, but rd. [[חָעָם]], LXX v. Di (E); of isles Ez Eze 26:18 (metaph., in fear); so Is 41:5 ([[קְחוֹת הארץ]], ‖[[אִיִּים יראו]]).

tremble, of persons under supernat. infl. 1Sa 14:15 (‖[[חֲרָדֶה]], [[וַתִּרְגַּז הָאָרָץ]]); start, start up (out of sleep) Ru 3:8; in mental disturbance Ge 27:33 (J; c. acc. cogn.) tremble, in terror Ex 19:16 (E), Is 32:11 (‖[[רגז]]), be startled (at sound of trumpet) Am 3:6 cf. 1Ki 1:49 (+ [[קום]], [[הלך]], [[ירא]]); tremble Ez Eze 26:16, Eze 32:10 sq. [[לְ]] = at, Job 37:1 ([[לִבִּי]]), be terrified, of Egypt (personif.) Is 19:16 (‖[[פָּחַד]]), Ramah Is 10:29, of Saul 1Sa 28:5 subj. [[לִבּוֹ]], ‖[[ירא]]).
be anxiously careful [[חָרַדְתְּ אֵלֵנוּ]] [[את־כל הַחֲרָדָה הַזּאׁת]] 2Ki 4:13.

with preps. pregn. = go or come trembling 1Sa 13:7 (sq. [[מֵאחריו]] LXXL We Dr) Ge 42:28 (E; sq. [[אֶל־]]) 1Sa 16:4 (sq. [[לִקְרָאתוֹ]]) so 1Sa 21:2, Ho 11:10 ([[מִיׇּם]]) v:Ho 11:11 ([[מִמִּחְרַיִם]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הֶחֱרִיד]] Ju Jdg 8:12, [[וְּהַחֲרַדְתִּ֫י]] 2Sa 17:2; Pt. [[מַחֲרִיד]] Le 6:26 + 11 t.; Inf. cstr. [[הַחֲרִיד]] Ez Eze 30:9, Zec 2:4; —drive in terror, rout an army, sq. acc. Ju Jdg 8:12, Ez Eze 30:9, Zec 2:4 cf. 2Sa 17:2; (We prop. [[החרידו]] Ho 5:8 ‘ setzt Benj. in Schrecken, ’ for MT [[אַחֲרֶיךָ]]); in Pt. abs., only in ´[[וְאֵין מ]]; and none shall terrify, i.e. disturb the peace of those reposing—[[שׁכב]], [[שׁקט]], [[רבץ]], [[ישׁב]], [[ישׁב לָבֶטַחִ]]—in the promised land Le 26:6, so after captivity Je 30:10 = Je 46:27, also Ez Eze 34:28, Eze 39:26, Mic 4:4, Zep 3:13; of undisturbed peace of the righteous Job 11:19; peace of flocks in forsaken cities Is 17:2; undisturbed feeding on carrion by fowl and beast De 28:26, Je 7:33, undisturbed prowling of lions Na 2:12 (metaph. of Assyrians).
